titles.title: Recognizing the accomplishments of the University of Southern California's football, women's volleyball, and men's water polo teams.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Committee on Education and the Workforce discharged.
Consideration initiated by previous order of the House.
Considered by previous order of the House.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 511.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to a previous order of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/4/2004--Passed House without amendment. Recognizes and congratulates the University of Southern California's football team (which won its 21st Rose Bowl victory), women's volleyball team (which won its sixth national championship), and men's water polo team (which won its second NCAA title) for their achievements.
